entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
